SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: FILL &OPTIONS_ARRAY#[] = STR_SPLIT(&CHECKBOX_OPTIONS#,";") : SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&OPTIONS_ARRAY#[])
: IF &LEN# GT 0 : SET &HANDLE# = PREP_PROCESS_VAR(&OPTIONS_VARA#) : SET &OPTIONS# = " " : PROCESS &HANDLE# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HANDLE#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_VAR(&OPTIONS_VARA#,&KEY#,1) : SET &VAR# = 1 : WHILE &VAR# LE &LEN# : IF &VALUE# EQ &OPTIONS_ARRAY#[&VAR#] : SET &OPTIONS# = STR_CAT(&OPTIONS#, "&KEY# ") : PRINT "&KEY# = &VALUE#" : ENDIF : SET &VAR# = &VAR#+ 1 : ENDWHILE : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HANDLE# : ENDIF
